Summary ✯✯✯Experienced Enterprise Project, Program, Portfolio Manager & Lean Process Improvement Consultant✯✯✯ 
 
Shabana Wollin specializes in Enterprise-wide, multi-year portfolio management, project management best practices, methodology adoption, execution and process improvement. She has more than 15 years of experience that began with designing & managing efficient,repeatable business processes for companies establishing standardized work & automating workflow management (WfM). Her expertise involves enterprise PPM & product development life cycles. She progressed to work for a variety of renowned companies, in various industries, in multidisciplinary functions and roles. She is adept in understanding requirements, leading a team of business analysts, scope management, strategy execution, project governance, project stakeholder management, project management process life cycle, program governance, SDLC, and leading CF teams. Recently, she has expanded her focus to help her clients organize, manage & integrate their data so that they are better prepared to leverage the powerful capabilities of advanced predictive analytics that enables a data-driven decision making process that lead to better business outcomes.  
 
SPECIALTIES: 
Full Life Cycle Project Management, Full Life Cycle Program Management, Account Relationship Management, Project Monitoring & Control, Project Estimation, Project Risk Management, Resource Management, Onboarding, Training & Coaching, Enterprise Project Portfolio Management, Program Financial Forecasting & Budgeting, Vendor Management & Negotiations, PMO Methodology & Processes, Program Management Life Cycle, Project Management Life Cycle 
 
Shabana is a PMI certified Project Management Professional (PMP) and holds certifications as ITIL v3 Foundations Professional & Six Sigma Black Belt. She is a member of Toastmasters International and welcomes opportunity as a keynote speaker at conferences, workshops and user group communities. Shabana Wollin specializes in Enterprise-wide, multi-year portfolio management, project management best practices, methodology adoption, execution and process improvement. She has more than 15 years of experience that began with designing & managing efficient,repeatable business processes for companies establishing standardized work & automating workflow management (WfM). Her expertise involves enterprise PPM & product development life cycles. She progressed to work for a variety of renowned companies, in various industries, in multidisciplinary functions and roles. She is adept in understanding requirements, leading a team of business analysts, scope management, strategy execution, project governance, project stakeholder management, project management process life cycle, program governance, SDLC, and leading CF teams. Recently, she has expanded her focus to help her clients organize, manage & integrate their data so that they are better prepared to leverage the powerful capabilities of advanced predictive analytics that enables a data-driven decision making process that lead to better business outcomes.

Summary Neerav Shah has over 15 years of international experience in the technology and IT industries at leading software and systems integration enterprises. Currently Mr Shah is the Sales Director in the UK and Northern Europe for Lithium Technologies, the leading provider of Social CRM and Community Platforms. Previously Mr. Shah spent 9.5 years at Motive Inc (a division of Alcatel-Lucent since 2008) where he was a direct account executive selling complex high value software solutions to wireline and wireless service providers in the UK and across Europe. Prior to that, Mr. Shah was a manager within KPMG Consulting’s northeast Communications, Content and Commerce industry located in New York City. Mr. Shah also held various senior technical roles at Tivoli Software (IBM) and DBMX Limited (IBM). Mr. Shah has an extensive network of telecoms, hi-tech and media contacts across Europe and the United States. Mr. Shah holds a BSc in Computer Science from City University London. 
 
Mr. Shah has been the founding member of two companies in EMEA (Motive and Lithium) when their respective boards of directors decided to expand into the region, demonstrating solid experience in growing companies from a startup to an established business with predictability. 
 
Specialties: Selling high value solutions. 
Software start-up experience. 
Deep experience selling into telcos/service providers. 
International experience. 
SaaS.

Sr. Software Engineer Strategic Management Group Inc August 1999  –  November 2001  (2 years 4 months) Greater Philadelphia Area IQNet Platform Design & Implementation: 
 
• Design & implementation of three-tier state based Learning Management System (LMS) and Learning Delivery System (LDS), which runs on Windows 2000 platform utilizing the Microsoft Internet Information Server, and consists of Active Server Pages. Management & Participant information are stored in a relational database (SQL Server 7.0). Business logic (Microsoft COM based) keeps track of usage performance, real time usage statistics, controls user navigation & retrieves content based on client. System allows high-level client based content customization (data is stored in a single database). System also contains extensive administration site that allows clients to views user and group statistics, it also allows administrator to set parameters on how the system performs (based on client). 
 
Huthwaite Strategic SPIN®/E-Biz IQNet/Finance IQNet Product Design & Implementation: 
• Development of platform to be used in three distinct products. 
 
Simulation-Centric Learning Solutions Development: 
• Design & implementation of three distinct simulation-centric learning solutions used in teaching and consulting. Products include “Optimizing the Supply Chain” (OSC), “Project Management” (PRM) and “Managing Change” (MCH). Important feature of OSC contain a complex mathematical model simulating the supply chain functionality. Designed & development of the first java-based and web-based implementation of the financial model at SMG. Developed software that translates model designed in PowerSim into java-based code. Developed software enabled us to directly translate complex financial models developed using PowerSim into Java Code (with minimal amount of user manipulation). Provided extensive consultation to other solutions under development as well as writing software to facilitate this development. Software includes system that automatically parses simulation storyboards and automatically populates the database.
